thread.title: Julian Edelman’s immediate reaction to his incredible Super Bowl catch was screaming ‘I CAUGHT IT!'
thread.title_full: Julian Edelman’s immediate reaction to his incredible Super Bowl catch was screaming ‘I CAUGHT IT!'

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Julian Edelman’s immediate reaction to his incredible Super Bowl catch was screaming ‘I CAUGHT IT!'
text:
LOUD NOISES
Remember the greatest catch in football history we saw on Sunday? Now we can hear what Patriots Julian Edelman was thinking when he caught it.
UNREAL 

Watch @Patriots ' @Edelman11 mic'd up making the most clutch catch in #SB51 . #InsideTheNFL finale TONIGHT 9p ET/PT. #Patriots pic.twitter.com/pbBEoMAo9l 
— Inside the NFL (@insidetheNFL) February 7, 2017 That’s it, that’s what he was thinking: “I CAUGHT IT!”
Seeing it with the sound is almost like the NFL Bad Lip Reading , only it’s real, and he DID catch it, even if he did have to defend himself to Falcons’ Brian Poole.
This Edelman clip from @insidetheNFL is hilarious. Dude went through every possible emotion in the span of 30 seconds pic.twitter.com/2mEnnYFVL5 
— Steve Perrault (@Steve_Perrault) February 8, 2017 This is even better. He was so worried, but once Bill Belichick told him it was good, he is just overjoyed.
